== Event photos and summary ==
<nowiki>[[http://www.flickr.com/photos/yasumoto/sets/72157606727662156/|Photos from the BugJam]]</nowiki> are on Joe's flickr account. The <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CaliforniaTeam/Meetings/08August10|August 10, 2008]]</nowiki> meeting has a recap from the event.

== Organizing notes ==

Welcome to the Ubuntu California Global Bug Jam! We're hosting an event to help make Ubuntu Linux even better! If you've ever wanted to learn how to get involved and help out, now is the time.

Before you arrive, please have set up your <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/GnuPrivacyGuardHowto|GPG]]</nowiki> key and sign the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/codeofconduct/1.0.1|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>. If you need help, we can set you up once you arrive.
